Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 26-2009. A 34-year-old 
man with cystic fibrosis with abdominal pain and distention.

Author information:
(1)Department of Medicine, Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center and Harvard

Erratum in
